Source: vignettes/sequence_module.Rmd
sequence_module.Rmd

Return the nth term in the fibonacci sequence (starting with 1)

This is not a very efficient implementation :-)

fibonacci <- function(n) { stopifnot(n>=1 && all.equal(n, as.integer(n))) ifelse(n>2, fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2), 1) }

Return the nth square number

square <- function(n) { stopifnot(n>=1 && all.equal(n, as.integer(n))) n^2 }

Return the nth triangular number

triangular <- function(n) { stopifnot(n>=1 && all.equal(n, as.integer(n))) n*(n+1)/2 }
